title: Emerald Vaalai Haaram with Diamond Lattice and Pearl Drops
materials: 18K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
EF Color) and stunning pear-shaped Emeralds. Features freshwater Pearls with high luster.
features: This contemporary Haaram blends classic South Indian design with modern elegance. The intricate diamond lattice work showcases exceptional craftsmanship. Pear-shaped emeralds provide a vibrant focal point, while the pearl drops add a touch of grace. The pendant is detachable, allowing for versatility in styling. The lattice design is reminiscent of traditional 'Jali' patterns, reinterpreted with a modern aesthetic.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with vibrant emerald green accents and soft pearl white.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham (శ్రీమంతం) or half-saree function (పావడా). Also suitable for upscale social events and evening galas.
description: This exquisite Haaram offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds ensure lasting brilliance and value. The detachable pendant allows for flexible styling, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, it showcases superior craftsmanship and timeless elegance, embodying the rich heritage of Hyderabad jewelry.
